rules.description: HHKB Arrow Mode (fn + semicolon/slash/open_bracket/quote to arrow keys, etc)
HHKB Media Key Mode (fn + asdf to Volume down/up/mute, eject)
HHKB Media Key Mode Extension (fn + zxc to playpause/prev/next)
HHKB Scroll Mode (fn + K/L/,/. to home/end/pgup/pgdown)
HHKB Arrow Mode (fn + semicolon/slash/open_bracket/quote to arrow keys, etc)
HHKB Media Key Mode (fn + asdf to Volume down/up/mute, eject)
HHKB Media Key Mode Extension (fn + zxc to playpause/prev/next)
HHKB Scroll Mode (fn + K/L/,/. to home/end/pgup/pgdown)
Change spacebar to left_shift if pressed with other keys (Post spacebar when pressed alone)
Change enter to left_control if pressed with other keys (Post enter when pressed alone)
